scripts.test:a11y: axe http://localhost:3000 --exit 1 || (echo 'Run frontend with npm run dev in another terminal' && exit 0)
scripts.test:smoke: node -e "fetch('http://localhost:3000').then(r=>{if(!r.ok)process.exit(2); else process.exit(0)}).catch(()=>process.exit(2))" || (echo 'Start app to run smoke test' && exit 0)
